scripts.build: npm run --prefix ttc-delay-client build && rm -rf ./public && mv ttc-delay-client/dist public
scripts.deploy: npm run --prefix ttc-delay-client build && rm -rf ./public && mv ttc-delay-client/dist public && firebase deploy --only hosting --project ttc-delay
scripts.deploy:ci: npm run --prefix ttc-delay-client build && rm -rf ./public && mv ttc-delay-client/dist public && firebase deploy --only hosting --project ttc-delay --token $FIREBASE_CI_TOKEN
